ValidationRule.description: validation error message should display when Remove/Disconnect Complete checked and Disposition of Dispenser Upon Removal not having "Removed and taken to SP for Storage" or "Disconnected and placed in Backroom" values
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: if(AND(RecordType.Name=$Label.IP_Relocation_I4W_Rec_Type,ISChanged(FS_Relocation_from_old_outlet_to_SP_is__c),FS_Relocation_from_old_outlet_to_SP_is__c,OR(TEXT(FS_Disposition_of_Dispenser_Upon_Removal__c)= "",NOT(OR(TEXT(FS_Disposition_of_Dispenser_Upon_Removal__c)= "Removed and taken to SP for Storage",TEXT(FS_Disposition_of_Dispenser_Upon_Removal__c)= "Disconnected and placed in Backroom")))),true,false) && NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, $Label.Exclude_User))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must select an appropriate value within the "Disposition of Dispenser Upon Removal" field in order to proceed
